english.segment1: You are more beautiful than anyone ever. Everyday You're the same You never change no never
english.segment2: You are more beautiful than anyone ever. Everyday You're the same You never change no never. And how can I ever deny the love of my Savior. You are to me everything all I need forever
english.segment3: How could you be so good?
english.segment4: [Chorus:]. There is no one like You. There has never ever been anyone like You
english.segment5: Everywhere You are there earth or air surrounding. I'm not alone the heavens sing along. My God You're so astounding. How could You be so good to me. Eternally I believe that
english.segment7: How could You be so good to me. How could You be so good to me. We're not alone so sing along. We're not alone so sing along. Sing along, sing along
